label: 雑色
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Lower functionaries within the imperial bureaucracy, and also within the great noble houses of Heian times. Minamoto Yoritomo assigned special duties to a class of zōshiki　who had become his personal attendants.　[Cf. Mass, 1976]
